lead_paragraph: MILLINGER--Harvey, 99, passed away peacefully at home, in the company of his family, on January 25, 2016. Loving husband of Sylva Dee, and father of Bruce (Xiao-Fang) and Donald (Gary Clinton). Funeral services will be at Sunset Chapels, 1285 Northern Blvd, Manhasset, NY on January 28 at 11:00am. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to Temple Sinai of Roslyn, Roslyn Heights, NY. He was a kind and gentle man, and family and friends were exceptionally fortunate to have shared his life for so many years. He will be greatly missed. 1/3
